solution.text:
Total no. of outcomes on rolling a pair of dice \(=36\)
No. of outcomes such that the number on both dice is even \(=9\)
Sample space :\([(2,2), (2,4), (2,6), (4,2) (4,4), (4,6), (6,2), (6,4), (6,6)]\)
Probability \(=\frac{9}{36}\)
\(=\frac{1}{4}\)

content.text: An even number on both dice?
